name: Gabriel de Jesus Silva
presentation: Hello! My name is Gabriel de Jesus Silva. I've been a programmer for over 3 years . I have extensive experience in the Javascript ecosystem. I worked on several types of projects, mainly focused on Health and R&S.
resume: My name is Gabriel de Jesus Silva, I'm 23 years old and I'm from Salvador, Bahia, Brazil, currently, I live in the state of Bahia, in the city of Senhor do Bonfim. I started my career as a developer at the end of 2018 by interning at a company in my city.
educationBackground:
I started learning programming in early 2018, as soon as I entered a technical course in Computer Science at the Instituto Federal de Educação, Ciência e Tecnologia, from which I graduated in 2019.
In the same year, I also began my graduation in Computer Science at the same institute, and have completed 4 semesters out of 8.
professionalBackground:
My first professional experience was at the end of 2018, when I did an internship at a company called Newtic. During this period, I learned to create APIs with Node.js and user interfaces with Vue.js.

Since then, I have been providing services to other companies using technologies from the Javascript Ecosystem.

skills.name: Javascript
skills.description: Javascript is my main language since I started my professional career as a programmer. I have extensive experience in your ecosystem both front-end and back-end.

skills.name: Node.js
skills.description: Node.js is the main technology I use for backend development. I have been working professionally with this technology since 2019 for the development of APIs and SSR applications.

projects.name: Demand To Invoice
projects.description: Takaoka Anesthesia is a network of anesthesiologists who hire on-demand anesthetists for hospitals or surgeons. The project developed was a system of medical scales, from registration, through patient care to payment.

experiences.description: RedFox is a technology company. It works on several projects, mainly focused on the health sector. During the period that I worked at RedFox, I worked on several projects of that area such as: platforms of medical scales and NPS for clinics and hospitals.
